title: Married someone who did not pray, did minor Shirk, etc. but now is practicing; is my marriage valid?
transcript: [Music] farzana says someone who married at the time of not praying was superstitious um new miner shirk but now he prays regularly is the marriage valid as long as when he got married he was known to be muslim he claimed to be a muslim all around him knew him as a muslim and it was never brought up to court to prove that he was an apostate or a mushrik or a non-muslim this means that his marriage was valid in sha allah knows best
